infotexts.jobdescription.fad_cook: Cooks, well, cook. A submarine needs food, and usually you want someone to be good at cooking doing that.
infotexts.entitydescription.cookhat: A hat that signifies the ship cook, by right of looking ridiculous.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_compatpill: Provides compatibility for mods that override the Human character. Should not be used if nothing's overriding Human. Adds +3 Hunger and +3 Thirst.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_coffeebean: A coffee bean genetically modified to survive better on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_smlcookingstation: A device for cooking food and making drinks.
A device for cooking food and making drinks. Place with Aim+Use.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_crawlermeat: Slimy and smells horrible. Doesn't look particularly edible, but could be made into something far more tasty.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_molochmeat: Meat harvested from a Moloch. Doesn't look particularly edible, but could be made into something far more tasty.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_threshermeat: Tough, raw meat from a Thresher. Doesn't look particularly edible, but could be made into something far more tasty.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_spinemeat: Prickly, poisonous raw meat from a Spineling. Doesn't look particularly edible, but could be made into something far more tasty.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_flour: Not actually real flour, but the results are close enough. May be slightly carcinogenic.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_waterbottle: Europan Spring branded water, brought to you by the people behind Crawler Cola. May not actually be spring water.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_coffee: A caffeine-filled drink with a legacy dating back centuries.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_beer: An alcoholic beverage that definitely isn't crawler urine, we promise.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_saltdrink: Exceptionally salty. It'd be refreshing, if the taste didn't make you feel like you just got punched in the face.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_rationbar: A plant-based survival ration bar that can last years. It is also so incredibly hard it can be used as structural material.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_hqrationbar: A plant-based ration bar that can last years. This version is significantly less hard than others, and doesn't taste like chalk.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_baguette: An Europan reproduction of an Earth baguette. Do not consume through any orifice other than the mouth.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_cookie: Just like Grandma Mudraptor used to make.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_huskcaviar: Supposedly the high class of Europa eat these slimy platters of mostly sterilised husk eggs.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_curry: A spicy dish that is supposed to be a reproduction of an Earth food, has the consistency of mud.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_mudraptorscramble: Scrambled mudraptor eggs. The less of those things there are, the better.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_crawlersteak: This meat resembles nothing to what it previously did - it smells quite nice and looks delicious.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_molochsushi: A remarkably edible dish of moloch meat wrapped in plant fibers.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_stew: A thick, rich stew made from various alien parts.
infotexts.entitydescription.fad_threshershish: A shishkebab made from Thresher meat and various fruits.
